note:
HealthHIV is a national non-profit working with healthcare organizations, communities, and providers to advance effective HIV, HCV, STI and LGBTQ health care, harm reduction and health equity through education and training, technical assistance and capacity building, advocacy, communications, and health services research and evaluation.

HealthHIV leads the HealthHCV initiative, the National Center for Health Care Capacity Building, and the National Coalition for LGBTQ Health.

Posts a BBC News summary 6 times a day: every 3 hours from 6am-9pm.

How it works: archive.org watches BBC News TV to record a raw feed of 'chyron' headlines on the lower-third of the screen. This automation extensively cleans and processes the headlines before passing it to OpenAI's GPT-4 for summarisation.

See @tv which posts US news and was the direct inspiration for this service. Unofficial. Not affiliated with BBC.
